}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "NL-2511UB4 Mercury-020" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{wlanng_hw |nicid=8010 |nic_ver=1.0.0 |pri_id=0015 |pri_ver=1.1.4 |sta_id=001f |sta_ver=1.7.6 }} .. but the STA firmware may have been updated.
